name: DCPingMC
description: Minecraft server ping bot for Discord.

prefix.description: Your discord bot's prefix, if your not sure then set it to '!'.

serverName.description: The name of your server, this will be used in messages.

pingInterval.description: The interval in seconds in which to check for the server status.

embedColor.description: The embed color for Discord messages.

statusChannelID.description: Channel ID of the channel you want your bot to post it's status.

author: Joris Vos
